name: @applandstream/streaming-view-sdk
description: React component for Streaming Project to interact with the Edge Node Stream

scripts.build: rm -rf build && babel index.js measurement.js -d build --source-maps && babel src -d build/src --copy-files --source-maps && echo '@applandstream/streaming-view-sdk' > build/README.md && cp package.json build/package.json
scripts.version: echo "{\"tag\": \"$(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')\"}" > src/build-info.jso && git add src/build-info.json
scripts.postversion: cp package.json build/package.json && cp .npmrc build/.npmrc  && cp src/build-info.json build/src/build-info.json

author: Appland
